alert.note: Alert for Adams; Blackford; Grant; Jay; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 01 at 10:09AM EST until February 04 at 1:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM WEDNESDAY TO 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 16 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...From 1 PM Wednesday to 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult to impossible. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility especially Thursday. The hazardous conditions will affect commutes starting Wednesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to snow from northwest to southeast on Wednesday. Some freezing rain and sleet could mix in at times. This will likely be a long duration snow event, with periods of moderate to heavy snow and reduced visibilities possible Wednesday afternoon through Thursday evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
